reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 77/21: STAY-AT-HOME ORDER (NIAGARA REGIONAL AREA HEALTH UNIT)
reg_info.reg_name_text: STAY-AT-HOME ORDER (NIAGARA REGIONAL AREA HEALTH UNIT)
reg_info.act_under: Emergency Management and Civil Protection Act

content.content: 1. The terms of this Order are set out in Schedule 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The terms of this Order are set out in Schedule 1.

content.content: 2. In this Order, “health unit” means a health unit as defined in the Health Protection and Promotion Act. SCHEDULE 1
content.raw_html:
2. In this Order,

“health unit” means a health unit as defined in the Health Protection and Promotion Act.

SCHEDULE 1

content.content: 1. Ontario Regulation 11/21 (Stay-at-Home Order) made under the Act applies to the Niagara Regional Area Health Unit.
content.raw_html: 1. Ontario Regulation 11/21 (Stay-at-Home Order) made under the Act applies to the Niagara Regional Area Health Unit.
